title: America: from Hitler to M-X
creator_credit: Joan Harvey, Saul Newton, Ralph Klein, Albee Gordon, Fourth Wall Repertory and Parallel Films
brief_description: A striking film statement about the military aims of the United States today; its longstanding first strike policy, and the escalating threat of worldwide annihilation. Here is an expose of America’s top level corporate and banking links with fascism for over sixty years. The film indicts the United States as aggressor in today’s international move to war
